annotation.message: An operand identifier reference is hiding another identifier of the same name.

a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD18SCholeraWCVaccinesLogic (IMMZ.D18.S.Cholera.WC vaccines schedule) * Schedule Table: Whole-cell (WC) vaccines (Shanchol, Euvchol and mORCVAX), 2-dose schedule */ library IMMZD18SCholeraWCVaccinesLogic

a:t.name: complete
a:t.value: First cholera dose was administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Dose number" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 1

a:s.a:s: "One cholera primary series dose was administered"

expression.name: One cholera primary series dose was administered

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Cholera dose 1

a:t.name: description
a:t.value: Provision of the cholera dose 1

a:t.name: trigger
a:t.value: Child's birth and no cholera doses have been administered

a:t.name: pseudo
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 0

a:t.name: triggerDate
a:t.value: "Date of birth"

a:s.a:s: "No cholera primary series dose was administered"

operand.name: No cholera primary series dose was administered

a:t.name: dynamicValue
a:t.value: Cholera dose 1 Due Date

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" + 1 year

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Cholera dose 1 Create

a:t.name: create
a:t.value: WC vaccines: 2 doses should be given 14 days apart to individuals aged ≥ 1 year. Revaccination is recommended where there is continued risk of Vibrio cholerae infection. For WC vaccines, revaccination is recommended after 3 years.

a:s.a:s: 'WC vaccines: 2 doses should be given 14 days apart to individuals aged ≥ 1 year. Revaccination is recommended where there is continued risk of Vibrio cholerae infection. For WC vaccines, revaccination is recommended after 3 years.'

operand.value: WC vaccines: 2 doses should be given 14 days apart to individuals aged ≥ 1 year. Revaccination is recommended where there is continued risk of Vibrio cholerae infection. For WC vaccines, revaccination is recommended after 3 years.

a:t.name: dynamicValue
a:t.value: Cholera dose 1 Overdue

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: To be determined by Member States; however, there is no recommended overdue date.

a:t.name: dynamicValue
a:t.value: Cholera dose 1 Expiration

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: To be determined by Member States; however, there is no recommended expiration date and individuals are always eligible to be vaccinated.

def.name: The primary series has been completed

a:t.name: complete
a:t.value: The primary series has been completed

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Completed the primary vaccination series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = TRUE

a:s.a:s: "Two cholera primary series doses were administered"

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Cholera dose 2

a:t.name: description
a:t.value: Provision of the cholera dose 2

a:t.name: trigger
a:t.value: First cholera dose administered

a:t.name: pseudo
a:t.value: "Dose number" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines"and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 1

a:t.name: triggerDate
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines")

operand.name: The primary series has been completed

a:t.value: Cholera dose 2 Due Date

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") + 2 weeks

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Cholera dose 2 Create

a:t.name: create
a:t.value: WC vaccines: 2 doses should be given 14 days apart to individuals aged ≥ 1 year.

a:s.a:s: 'WC vaccines: 2 doses should be given 14 days apart to individuals aged ≥ 1 year.'

def.name: First cholera booster dose was administered

a:t.name: complete
a:t.value: First cholera booster dose was administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Dose number" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Booster dose") = 1

a:s.a:s: "At least one booster series dose was administered"
"Dose number of the latest dose is one"

operand.name: At least one booster series dose was administered
Dose number of the latest dose is one

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Cholera booster dose 1

a:t.name: description
a:t.value: Provision of the cholera booster dose 1

a:t.name: trigger
a:t.value: Primary series for cholera has been completed and latest cholera dose was administered more than 3 years ago

a:t.name: pseudo
a:t.value: "Completed the primary vaccination series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = TRUE AND Today's date − latest "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") ≥ 3 years

a:t.name: triggerDate
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines")

"Dose number of the latest dose is two"
